Summary: saw a disc shaped object, after it was pointed out by12 to 15 people
divs: sighting detailswe arrived at fuller lake ronnie and i on a fishing trip.it was dark out and we entered into the campground area looking for a campsite, when all of a sudden 2 girls stepped right out in front of my car. i had to stomp on the brakes to avoid hitting them. the had saw our large flashlight shining out of the car window. when i stopped the car they yelled out " are you a park ranger?" seeing our spotlight they assumed so. we told them no , we're just fisherman and laughed. they said they were looking for a ranger because there was a ufo over the lake. and then took off. we looked at each other and gave chase. we followed the light from their flashlight weaving thru the trees. i was yelling at ron '"don't lose them", then all of a sudden we came out into a clearing and there was 6 campsites or so on the edge of the lake with maybe 12 to 15 people standing around, they were all drawn to loking to the south end of the lake. i looked in that direction and saw a disc shaped object hoovering there maybe 150 to 200 ft. off the groundmaybe a 1\3 of a mile away, on the south end of the lake. it was visable due to the lights that were being ammited by it. i aked ron what he thought. it looks like a disc, there was no noise. everyone saw it and was talking about what it could be. i told ron i'm going back to the car to get my binoculars. when i got to the car i relized we had left the light on the car on and the doors open. i guess we were in a hurry. i secured the car and returned with the binoculars. it had not moved. i looked at it and could tell it had red and blue lights revolving around it counter clockwise with a couple of white lights crisscrossing accross the top domed part of the craft. it was amazing then someone else saw me with my binoculars, stated " i didn't even think about that" he reached inside his camper and pulled out a pair of binoculars like you would see on a battleship. he raised them up and said "o my god." i said let me look and had him lean down so i could rest them on someone elses tailgate on their truck. it was amazing ,the view filled the the lense.everyone saw it. we took pics thru the binoculars and took down everyone names and phone numbers. there was one person in the group was a lawyer so we gave him all the contact names and the film. and he said he would organize reporting the sighting. we all watched in amazement as it just hoovered there. we finely went and set up our camp and we could still see it from there. we built a large fire and watched. after approx. 2 hours or so i loked up and it was just gone. we waited to hear from the contact person, the lawyer, but that never happened. i just don't get it. he was the only person that had the others names and numbers. i just couldn't believe it. but i know that there is at 15 or more people out there that were just as disappointed as i was. i remember like it was yesterday. and will never forget it. it was so close. and was there for so long. there are other people out there that saw it. and i'm sure they haven't forgot also. if this could be posted maybe some others could come forward. it was amazing.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Nevada City
There were no other sightings in Nevada City on or around April 30th 1986
